First of all. It's freaking Half-Life 2. Great Graphics, Great story, Fun game play and Best of all.. THE GUNS! This is a must buy.
Do I even need to explain why you should play this?
One of my favourite valve classic games!

The first half-life was mind-blowing for its time, and this game is no different. The Source engine back in 2004 was amazing, and still is to this day.
For a game that's 16 years old, it holds up beautifully to the modern standards. The gameplay is fluid, the story telling is good, combat is what you expect from a half-life game, and the atmosphere is incredible.
I really don't get the feeling of being on a different world with other-games, but the way that half-life handles atmosphere is mind-blowing for its time, and so many games still cant get this feeling right. The feeling of being in a city with endless apartment blocks, with people living the best they can while being treated like garbage, and always hearing something in the background right out of sight is perfect. Considering this game drops to 0.81$ on sale, its worth every penny, this game, its episodes and the source engine are classic gold-mines.
9/10.

I'm ashamed that it took me this long to try this franchise. After completing Half Life, I was super excited to play its sequel. This game is probably one of the best sequels ever made, and I could tell that right from the get go when the G man wakes you up after the events of the first game. This is possibly one of the best games I have ever played. The world in HL2 is super engaging, and the gameplay never gets old. There's a good variety of weapons to choose from, and they all feel fun to use. The combat is frantic and it encourages you to always keep moving and conserve ammo. I never got bored with the combat or physics puzzles the game throws at you. The addition of the gravity gun is also a really great way to let players interact with the physics engine and environment. The graphics, while dated, still look very nice, and I can't say that they distracted from the experience. Even after finishing the game and its two episodic sequels, I still come back to replay my favorite moments over and over again. I can't recommend this game highly enough.
